b.description: Minimize total cost subject to the given limit on cycle time.

cycle_time.description: Definition of the cycle time limit (note that production volume is inversely proportional to cycle time).

a.description: Do not change this parameters compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to the cycle time limit.

b.description: Start with a completely blank configuration, meaning no stations, robots, tools, storage units, or human operators, as planning begins from scratch.

modification_of_stations.description: Determine whether stations can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

c.description: Allow the optimization engine to modify stations arbitrarily, as the downtime is acceptable for this long-term production system upgrade.

modification_of_robots.description: Determine whether robots can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

c.description: Allow the optimization engine to modify robots arbitrarily, as the downtime is acceptable for this long-term production system upgrade.

modification_of_tools.description: Determine whether tools can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

c.description: Allow the optimization engine to modify tools arbitrarily, as these minor adjustments can be promptly applied.

modification_of_storages.description: Determine whether storages can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

c.description: Allow the optimization engine to modify storages arbitrarily, as these minor adjustments can be promptly applied.

modification_of_humans.description: Determine whether the allocation of human workers can be modified compared to the initial configuration or not.

c.description: Allow the optimization engine to modify the allocation of human workers arbitrarily.

modification_of_tasks.description: Definition of tasks in the process plan.

a.description: Do not change these parameters compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to products or the process plans.

modification_of_cost_human.description: Definition of the labor cost of human workers.

b.description: Modify the labor cost of human workers to ${cost_human}.

modification_of_cost_invest_base_cell.description: Definition of the investment cost for building an empty base cell.

a.description: Do not change this parameter compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to this parameter.

modification_of_cost_invest_tool.description: Definition of the investment cost for tools.

a.description: Do not change these parameters compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to these parameters.

modification_of_cost_invest_robot.description: Definition of the investment cost for robots.

a.description: Do not change these parameters compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to these parameters.

modification_of_cost_invest_storage.description: Definition of the investment cost for storages.

a.description: Do not change these parameters compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to these parameters.

modification_of_cost_maintain_cell.description: Definition of the maintenance cost for each station per period.

a.description: Do not change this parameter compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to this parameter.

modification_of_cost_maintain_robot.description: Definition of the maintenance cost for each robot per period.

a.description: Do not change this parameter compared to the reference value, as the scenario does not require any modification to this parameter.
